analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma duka tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: Naāsavaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca noāsavo sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ.
analyzed: na āsavam na sanidassana sappaṭigham dhammam paṭicca no āsavaḥ sanidassana sappaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā eka

original: Nanoāsavaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca noāsavo sanidassanasappaṭigho
analyzed: na no āsavam na sa nidassana sa paṭigham dhammam paṭicca no āsavaḥ sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe…
analyzed: dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā eka saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi adhipatiyā tīṇi pe

original: Noāsavaṁ naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Purimanayena tīṇi pañhā.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… aññamaññe ekaṁ …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: no āsavam na anidassana sappaṭigham dhammam paṭicca purima nayena tīṇi pañhāḥ hetuyā tīṇi adhipatiyā tīṇi pe aññamaññe ekam pe vipāke ekam pe avigate tīṇi

original: Noāsavaṁ naanidassanaappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca noāsavo anidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ, adhipatiyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: no āsavam na anidassana appaṭigham dhammam paṭicca no āsavaḥ anidassana appaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā eka adhipatiyā ekam pe avigate eka
